name: Cadet Development Demo
description:
Cadet is a 2.5d Platformer where the player controls a astro dog known as Cadet. The aim of the game is to explore the space station while also defending it from a mysterious invasion force.

Ive been developing this in my spare tiome for a year and a half or so. After throwing together a first a second level as well as a basic story plan ive been gradually improving it along side my skill set.

Enjoy!
